synergynet3.cluster.sharedmemory

Class DistributedPropertyChangedListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • synergynet3.cluster.sharedmemory.DistributedPropertyChangedListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.hazelcast.core.EntryListener<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, java.util.EventListener

    public class DistributedPropertyChangedListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.hazelcast.core.EntryListener<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
    The listener interface for receiving distributedPropertyChanged events. The class that is interested in processing a distributedPropertyChanged event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addDistributedPropertyChangedListener method. When the distributedPropertyChanged event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.
    See Also:
    DistributedPropertyChangedEvent
